Package com.rexsl.page

Page and content builders and manipulators.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Inset
    Insertion into a page.
    Resource
    JAX-RS resource has to implement this interface, in order to be injectable into BasePage.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasePage<T extends BasePage<?,?>,R extends Resource>
    Base page.
    BaseResource
    Base implementation of Resource.
    CookieBuilder
    Cookie builder.
    JaxbBundle
    JAXB bundle.
    JaxbBundle.Group<T>
    Group.
    JaxbGroup
    JAXB group of elements.
    Link
    HATEOAS link.
    PageBuilder
    Page builder.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Inset.Default
    Annotates a JAX-RS resource, informing the rendering mechanism about all Inset classes required for page rendering.
    Inset.Runtime
    Annotates a method of JAX-RS resource that returns an instance of Inset.
    Resource.Forwarded
    This resource should understand X-Forwarded-For HTTP header and change its properties (mostly inside UriInfo) accordingly.

Package com.rexsl.page Description

Page and content builders and manipulators.

The only dependency you need is (check our latest version available at www.rexsl.com): 

<depedency>
   <groupId>com.rexsl</groupId>
   <artifactId>rexsl-page</artifactId>
 </dependency>
Since:
0.3.7
Version:
$Id$
Author:
Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)
